front.title: IPv6 Provider Edge Routers (6PE) Information Base (MIB)

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes a MIB module for IPv6 Provider Edge Routers (6PE)over Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switching Routers (LSRs).
